name: mermaid
title: Mermaid
description: A customizable Mermaid.js diagram renderer for React.

name: zoom-pan
title: ZoomPan
description: A generic zoom and pan wrapper for any React content. Supports scroll-to-zoom, click-drag pan, and pinch-to-zoom.

name: mermaid-themes
title: Mermaid Themes
description: A collection of themes and helpers for Mermaid diagrams.
